reqs: Pre-reqs: CHEM 304 and one of CHEM 218, CHEM 309.
description: A discussion of the involvement of inorganic chemistry in biological systems. Chemistry of cations, metalloenzymes, and simpler model systems. Reactions of coordinated ligands, chemistry of sulphur and phosphorus. Credit will be granted for only one of CHEM 435 or CHEM 526.
